title: Lulu Lemon Skin
body:
Let's give Lulu some more skin love!

Lulu would be wearing a yellow dress and have half a lemon on her head (like how Surprise Party Amumu has a cake on his head)

**Glitterlance** - Her glitterlance could shoot out the typical yellow tinted sparkles.

**Whimsy** - Lulu would turn the enemy into a giant lemon or a bunch of rolling lemons.

**Help, Pix!** - The shield on the ally or herself would have a yellow tint and like the Pool Party Lulu skin it could have symbols on the sides of lemonade.

**Wild Growth** - I don't have an idea for this but I'm sure it doesn't have to be changed much

**Recall** - Lulu could quickly build a (poorly made) lemonade stand and stand behind it near the end of the recall the top of the lemonade stand could fall down. With this recall it wouldn't have to take much work to make you could just use a large cloud of dust to cover lots of it being made like in old cartoons.

There could be some clever Emotes Lulu could say but I also have no ideas for this :(

Just my ideas of what this skin could be like :D

replies.body: I didn't know that skins had a impact on abilities... Lol

> [{quoted}](name=Epixragequit,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=VZxIAupw,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-08-27T06:07:06.097+0000)
>
> I didn't know that skins had a impact on abilities... Lol

Some skins change the way abilities look.
This is a cute idea ^_^ When I first read the title I thought you meant Lululemon, as in the brand that does yoga clothing lol
